parameters: You want me to eat at a time like this?
<Auto Player>No time to play guitar unfortunately.
<Auto Player>You'd think after all this time in the Pacific
Northwest I'd own a raincoat.\| Nope.
<Auto Player>You'd think after all this time in the Pacific
Northwest I'd own a raincoat.\| Nope.
<Auto Player>Well, at least my hands are clean now.
<Auto Player>Is that a little Sorry Bird I hear?
I swear I meant to be on time today!
<Auto Player>Hey, breathe!\. I know you, remember?\.
I only put dinner out, like, ten minutes ago, max.
<Auto Player>Yeah.\. C'mon, little bird.\. Let's eat.
<Auto Player>And then you can help me finish the chorus to
<Auto Event: 6>A new song?\. That one you were playing when I
<Auto Event: 6>I could hear it all the way down the hall.\.
<Auto Player>Good.\. I wrote it for you.\.
<Auto Event: 6>Oh!\. I, uh,\. got you some flowers.
<Auto Player>They're beautiful.\. I'll admire them right
<Auto Event: 6>Thunder? It started pouring rain just
as soon as I got here.
<Auto Player>Shit!\. ShitShitShit.\. I — I'll get help!
You just... sit tight. I'll — uh\. — I'll...
<Auto Player>Aargh!\| No service?! What do I– ?
<Auto Player>OH! Cassie!\. Her husband was a medic.\.
But\| I've gotta go out there to find her.
<Auto Player>Okay, uh.\. Okay.\. I'll find her.\.
I can do that, right?\. Can I do that?\|
<Auto Player>You stay here. I'll be back as soon as I can.
You'll be okay.\. Just...\. be okay, okay?
